item.name: Overall CMC Blade Status
item.description: This attribute defines the Blade subsystem health status being monitored by the chassis management card.

item.name: CMC Fan Status
item.description: This attribute defines the Fan subsystem health status being monitored by the chassis management card.

item.name: CMC Power Status
item.description: This attribute defines the power subsystem health status being monitored by the chassis management card.

trigger_prototype.name: Server has been powered off in chassis

trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {LLD SNMP - DELL CMC:drsServerMonitoringCapable.["{#SNMPVALUE}"].last(1m)}=3 or {LLD SNMP - DELL CMC:drsServerMonitoringCapable.["{#SNMPVALUE}"].last(1m)}=1 or {LLD SNMP - DELL CMC:drsServerMonitoringCapable.["{#SNMPVALUE}"].last(1m)}=4
trigger_prototype.name: Server has been removed in chassis
Power Supply in slot {#SNMPINDEX} has no input power or PSU is missing.

trigger.name: Firmware version has changed on CMC Controller 1
Firmware version has changed on CMC Controller 2
